title: Merge Cakes
description: Combine different cakes to get bonus and new cake recipes. Besides all this, the game keeps playing while you’re offline, so you always have rewards when you return!
instructions: Combine identical cakes by dragging them.

title: Ice Princess Pregnant Caring
description: Elsa is pregnant. Today she is the only one at home, but she makes an appointment to go to the hospital for examination. Can you take care of Elsa on this day? Please help Elsa to freshen up and then accompany her to the hospital for examination. After Elsa returns home, please help her make a delicious dinner.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Princess Cake Shop Cool Summer
description: Princess Elsa is a good dessert chef who owns a beautiful cake shop. It’s hot these days. Ice cream has increased sales. Elsa wants to cook some new productions for the summer. She invites Anna to try her cooking – two kinds of new ice cream. The cooking process are not difficult. Let’s prepare them with Elsa together! Hope Anna will like the new ice cream!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Sisters Halloween Face Paint
description: Let's celebrate Halloween with these sisters, Make them have wonderful scary face art and amazing halloween dresses and suitable accessories. Wish them for a Happy Halloween!
instructions: Use Mouse To Control

title: Princess Story Games
description: The most beloved of all fairy tales, Cinderella is not just a story anymore! It has now become a perfect way to train cognitive processes in your girl while at the same time she can have so much fun! Cinderella girl games for 10-year-olds and under are a beautiful way for a young lady to improve her memory and spatial intelligence as well as reading and comprehension abilities.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Alphabet Words
description: Alphabet Words With Alphabet Words, you learn words with their respective images. Game developed by: Nau.kids Alphabet Words With Alphabet Words, you learn words with their respective images. Game developed by: Nau.kids
instructions: Click on the corresponding image.

title: Moto Racer
description: Moto Racer is a fun racing game where you play against AI players. You can select your bike and upgrade it using the garage from main menu. Collect coins from levels and be the first player to reach the finish line! Play Moto Racer now for great fun!
instructions: Arrow keys to control motobike

title: 365 Solitaire Gold 12 in 1
description: Every day a new game in 365 Solitaire! Play Klondike 1, Klondike 3, Tri Peaks, Golf, FreeCell, Spider Solitaire, King's Corner, Baker's Game, Pyramid Solitaire, Yukon, Eight Off and Scorpion all in one single game! The game will change with each season. 365 Solitaire is playable on all devices and in portrait and landscape, you can change your preferences in the settings menu. The game features beautiful and easy to read cards, easy and tough game modes, daily challenges, achievements, undo's, quick matches, seasons mode and the game is available in English, Dutch, Norwegian and Spanish languages.
instructions: Choose your game mode! Drag the cards onto the correct spots.

title: Princess Halloween Makeup HalfFaces Tutorial
description: Princess Harlequin, Snow White and Tropical Princess decided to surprise their friends on Halloween. The girls chose an unusual make-up. The left and right halves of the face depict different characters. The princesses invite you to their Halloween double makeup workshop. Find out the secrets of the best fabulous makeup artists and make a splash at the holiday.
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.

title: Pumpkin Rider
description: Pumpkin Rider is a bike racing game in a halloween environment with a pattern of deadly obstacles. Drive carefully throughout the level to reach at the marked line. Good Luck
instructions: On Desktop - Use W / Up Key and S / Down Key to accelerate and de-accelerate. Use D / Right Key and A / Left Key to control rotation. On Mobile - Use gui buttons to control bike

title: Baby Taylor Halloween House
description: Halloween is coming! Next week is Halloween. Every kids love that day. They will dress special and collect candies. What a brilliant adventure. This year, Taylor’s family decide to make their house become a wonderful Halloween theme house. Then Taylor and her friends can have a party here. But house decorating is a big project. Can you help them? Indoor and outdoor both need decorations. Let’s go shopping at first!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Zombie Madness
description: At the end of 2019 there was an outbreak of the corona virus around the world .. and a vaccine was found to prevent it. But a few years later, it was discovered that the side effect of the vaccine was turning humans into zombies. you are one of them, infect as many humans so we can all become happy zombies.
instructions: move zombie with arrow or touch screen, and infect all humans

title: Halloween Coloring Book
description: Halloween Coloring Book is an online game that you can play for free. Halloween is coming! Let's play the cool coloring game to celebrate the arrival of the festival. There are 4 images for you to choose from. Some cute little witch and cats, a grimacing little boy and pumpkin lanterns. There will always be a picture for you. Now, it's your time. Come and create your own color world! This game is suitable for all ages. Halloween Coloring Book is playable online as an HTML5 game, therefore no download is necessary. Play around and have fun.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Baby Taylor Perfect Halloween Party
description: Halloween is coming soon; Taylor's teacher Doris decides to hold a masquerade on Halloween. Children must prepare good-looking costumes and make Halloween food together. Please go shopping and cooking with Taylor and her friends! Before attending the party, don't forget to decorate the party hall.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Halloween Mahjong Connection
description: Connect all the halloween mahjong tiles and clear the board in this html5 mahjong connection games. You can only connect 2 tiles with the same items with a path with no more than two 90 degree angles. What's the max level can you play?
instructions: Use mouse to play this html5 halloween mahjong connect games.

title: Mr. Bouncemasters 2
description: Play Mr. Bouncemasters 2 online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Burnin Rubber 5 XS
description: Race and shoot your way to the finish line in this fast-paced combat racing game. Earn cash and rewards to buy new cars and weapons. Discover all of the game's secrets and become the ultimate racing mercenary!
instructions: Use the Arrow keys to drive your car. Press Z and X to fire your weapons. Hold Shift to drift. You can also use the W, A, S, D keys to drive. Use the left and right mouse buttons to fire.

title: Four Colors Multiplayer
description: Four Colors is a HTML5 Card Games. Face up to 3 computer-controlled opponents. Match cards by color or number, play action cards to mix the game up and be the first to get rid of all cards. Last but not least: Do not forget to press the 1 button when you have only one card left! 3 Game’s Mode: - Multiplayer mode - Play against the pc - Challenge a friend playing on the same device
instructions: Tap the card to select it

title: Princess Summer Fashion
description: Welcome to summer! Have you ever hesitated what to dress up in summer? Don’t know the newest fashion style? Let’s see the princesses’ fashion choice! The three princesses Elsa. Ariel and Moana decide to go shopping and buy some new clothes. Each of them has made choices already. Now it’s time to show your favorite dress up!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Happy Halloween
description: Are you looking for some fun and excitement this Halloween? Then get ready to have some fun as you play Happy Halloween. Swipe on the items of the same type to destroy them and unlock all levels. Try to remove all casket and make the bats and ghost fall to the bottom row. Complete all the requirements within the given move and time. See how far you can get. Play NOW! Features: * cute characters: Moon, Pumpkin, Candies, Witch hat, bat, ghost and casket. * cool design and animation * perfect graphics and effects * entertaining background music and sound effects * challenging levels * 4 Power-Ups that will help you in the game: Hand to add 5 moves; Broom to remove one character; Potion to remove 9 characters; and Skull to remove all characters lined horizontally. * You may also use Special Power and Mixed Power
instructions: Swipe to match

title: Dead Zed
description: Shoot the zombies, organize search parties to look for survivors and new weapons, manage your group to defend and repair your safehouse. Have you got what it takes to survive?
instructions: Tips: Each survivor has its own set of skills. Use them wisely when distributing into parties. Have at least someone with higher fight skill in your search party, this will increase the survival chance of the whole party. Controls: Mouse to look and shoot. R to reload 1,2 – change weapons F – change fire mode M – mute

title: Nick Jr Halloween Dress Up
description: Play Nick Jr Halloween Dress Up online for free. Dress-up game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Military Shooter Training
description: Do you like shooting game? Would you like to enhance your sharp-shooting skills? Then get ready to be challenged while having so much fun playing Military Shooter Training. You can enjoy this game anytime and anywhere for free. You don't need to spend or go somewhere to practice because we will give you all the excitement at the comfort of your own. With its simple gameplay, cool design and amazing effects, players will surely have lots of fun and excitement.The game consists of 600 challenging levels for the Stage Mode; 8 Sections on Time Race; and 6 Sections for Battle. You may try to unlock Rifles (5 Standard and 15 Premium); Bullets (5 Standard and 15 Premium); Red Dot (5 Standard and 15 Premium); and Gears (2 Standard and 2 Premium). You may also unlock upgrade such as Wind Effect and Zoom Effect).This game will test your sharp-shooting skills, accuracy, patience as well as your eyes and hands coordination. Sounds good right? So what are you waiting for? Grab a chair and show off your shooting skills. Enjoy!
instructions: Drag mouse to Aim, Release mouse to Shoot

title: Dead Zed (No Blood)
description: Shoot the zombies, organize search parties to look for survivors and new weapons, manage your group to defend and repair your safehouse. Have you got what it takes to survive?
instructions: Tips: Each survivor has its own set of skills. Use them wisely when distributing into parties. Have at least someone with higher fight skill in your search party, this will increase the survival chance of the whole party. Controls: Mouse to look and shoot. R to reload 1,2 – change weapons F – change fire mode M – mute

title: Heroes of Match 3
description: Match three sweets in a line and create many delicious combinations to help King Donuttan The Third regain his throne. Show your three-in-a-row puzzle skills and challenge other players in tournaments. Constantly earn bonuses by completing daily tasks. Play with your friends or other players around the world. Dive into the world of grand battles and epic feats! Many heroes and lots of dramatic stories, as well as thousands of levels with exciting mechanics are waiting for you!i
instructions: Match the sweets to achieve your goals and beat the opponents!

title: Shoot or Die
description: Shoot or Die gunfight duelling game. Become the most feared gunslinger in the land by defeating all who stand in your way. Attempt to become the fastest gunslinger in this shootout game. Shoot or Die pits your reflexes against infinite computer opponents in one-on-one gun fights.
instructions: Controls / How To Play: 1) Select 'Start Game' and choose a character from the character select screen. 2) When the countdown reaches 'SHOOT', tap to shoot. 3) When the countdown reaches 'AVOID', no tap, you died!.

title: Halloween Grand Fest
description: Let's prepare the halloween Grand fest with mouthwatering recipe like pumpkin soup, scary eye ball cake and the long finger biscuits. Come and join us with this grand halloween fest. Happy Halloween!
instructions: Use Mouse To Control

title: Princess Puppy Caring
description: Princess's puppy hut got into a fire accident and the puppy got severe injury. Rescue the puppy and use the fire engine to recover the puppy hut. Later, give the best treatment to the puppy. Make our princess happy with wonderful outfits.
instructions: Use Mouse To Control

title: The Shooter
description: The Shooter is an excellent cyberpunk platform shooting game. Feel all the super charged feelings as you play and guide "M" ninja through a roller coaster of varying difficulty futuristic landscapes. Champion your way to each flag for a mega win.
instructions: Arrows : move Up : jump Up Up : double jump Ctrl : shoot

title: Zombie Shooter 2D
description: Zombie Shooter 2D is a fun shooting puzzle game where you get to shoot zombies in 15 levels. Play Zombie Shooter now for amazing fun and great graphics!
instructions: Use mouse to play

title: Dead City : Zombie Shooter
description: Get ready for one of the best fps sniper shooting games now! Time to gear up and enter the apocalypse wasteland world of Last Hope. Zombies, raiders and vicious deadly enemies roam the wasteland throughout the world. Rescue survivors and kill to stay alive, only you can save the world in this story driven first person shooter game.
instructions: WASD or Arrow Keys - Player Movement Mouse Move - Look Around Mouse left click - Fire

title: 4 in a row
description: Connect four dots in a row. Horizontally, vertically or diagonally. Extremely simple one touch gameplay. Play against other players. Can you beat your opponent?
instructions: Connect four dots in a row

title: Ball Drop 3D
description: Are you ready to fly with ball? Embark on a thrilling track journey accompanied by rocking music！ Be careful not to fall down when immerse in the thrill of speed on the track！ Just enjoy the feeling of flying in the air! The higher the flight, the more the score! A variety of skins are available for you to choose from, each of which gives you a different track feeling!
instructions: Drag mouse left & right

title: Bathroom clean and Deco
description: This is the right time for cleaning our bathroom perfectly and makes them more perfect by decorating the new bathroom fittings. Let's start the bathroom cleaning and have a great fun!
instructions: Use Mouse To Control

title: Baby Supermarket
description: Welcome to the biggest supermarket in the Town! Baby and Mommy Panda have to do the supermarket shopping today! Play together with friends and family, and help your favorite panda to do shopping in an animal's Supermarket.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Boat Challenge
description: Let's challenge how many coins you can collect, and how you will face the obstacles. All the best!,Let's challenge how many coins you can collect, and how you will face the obstacles. All the best!
instructions: Use mouse to click

title: Mahjong Halloween
description: An addictive game to train your eyes and brain. Match the pairs of the same tiles to clear them. You need to clear all the tiles before the time runs out, then play as fast as possible. Happy Halloween!
instructions: Tap each pair of the same tile to clear them.

title: Princess Glitter Coloring
description: Beautiful books were full of beautiful colors designed as Glitter dress Drawing And Coloring Pages For girls packed with more than 50 beautiful pages of beauty coloring, kids makeup, beauty girls, Accessories for girls, and more!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Monster Truck 2D
description: Monster Truck is a fun 2D game where you get to control a monster truck! Perform stunts and collect coins to finish the track. Play Monster Truck now for amazing fun!
instructions: AD / right, left arrows to control truck W, up arrow or space to jump

title: Air Wolves
description: Air wolves game is fun and attractive game to play. You can use pc keyboard "space bar" or touch on the screen or use game pad. This game is like a flappy bird game. Enjoy!
instructions: Use pc keyboard "space bar" or touch on the screen or use game pad.

title: Halloween Night Match 3
description: Halloween Night Match 3 – this cool game three in a row, in which you have to put the blocks of the same color in a series of three pieces or more to achieve the highest possible score, be careful to account the scale to the left did not fall too low, otherwise the game will be over. Enjoy the game!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Connect The Insects
description: "Mahjong Connect Classic" is a classic puzzle game inspired by the popular Chinese tile removal game, Mahjong. Your goal is to eliminate all the tiles on the board. Connect identical tiles to remove them, with each connection allowed no more than 2 turns. With 21 challenging levels to conquer, your aim is to complete each level before time runs out to earn extra bonus points. Dive into this tile-matching adventure and put your skills to the test!
instructions: Use mouse to touchscreen to play this game.

title: Mechanic Max
description: He will help you with repair and car makeover. You crashed and dirty car will be like new again. With plentiful supply, you can change your car into a racing car, taxi, fire engine, ambulance, vintage car, a speedy car, family car, and worker’s pick-up truck.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Connect A Dot
description: Connect A Dot is puzzle game where you need to connect the numbers in order from smallest to largest number to get the picture of the sea animal. Do not interrupt when connecting the dots with numbers and make a whole closed circle.
instructions: Use your mouse or finger to play this game.

title: Super Drag
description: Super Drag is a racing game. Use transmissions to change gear and beat your opponent. Win all races and become drag king. 10 different cars and very speed truck, just drug and enjoy. Good luck!
instructions: mouse or touch screen

title: Kick Master 3D
description: Kick Master 3D is fun addictive action hyper casual game. Click to Kick the opponents and Throw out the opponents before the opponent throw you out. Enjoy this wonderful hyper casual game.
instructions: Use mouse to play the game.

title: Assault Zone
description: 3D first person shooter. Take the challenge to invade the enemy captured territory and shoot all the guards one by one. Be quick otherwise they will fire back.
instructions: Desktop: Arrow keys or W,A,S,D to move the character. Mouse to turn the character, aim and shoot. Mobile: Use on-screen joystick to move, fire button to shoot, tap and drag on right side of the screen to aim and turn the character.

title: Making Words
description: Making words with the game Making Words makes words with the letters on the mobile phone tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids Making words with the game Making Words makes words with the letters on the mobile phone tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids
instructions: Make words with the letters.

title: Pretty Box Bakery Game
description: Hey, girls! How about holding a makeup cake baking salon party in the baking games? Every girl loves to buy a makeup kit and wants to be a beauty influencer! Now makeup artist, let’s DIY your cosmetic kit in a sweet way – make comfy cakes. Decorate beautiful girls' makeup cake with candies in the cooking games for girls!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Little Princess Lolita Style Makeover
description: Now in the fashion trend of little girls, the most popular gorgeous Lolita style. Every girl hopes that she can wear a gorgeous Lolita skirt and wear nice accessories. Elsa, Anna, and Belle also want to try Lolita style dress. Please help them make up, and then choose the most beautiful Lolita costumes for these little girls!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play
